name: Mushroom Risotto
recipe:
1. Saute onion and garlic
2. Add rice, cook until slightly translucent.
3. Add wine.
4. Add vegetable stock slowly, wait until some is absorbed before adding more.
5. Seperatley, cook mushrooms. 
6. Once rice is cooked: add mushrooms and extras. 
7. Add parmesan and season.
